title: TUESDAY - Coaching change in Philly 2021
itunes:title: TUESDAY - Coaching change in Philly 2021
description:
A surprise move Monday as Doug Pederson (0:08) was fired by the Eagles just 3 seasons after winning the team's first Super Bowl title. The Cowboys looking to shore up their defense with the hiring of a new defensive coordinator (1:17). We'll take a look at the divisional rounds of the playoffs (1:41) as one player looking to make NFL history this weekend (2:36) Plus, the latest on Bill Belichick turning down an award (3:43)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
